build.beforeDevCommand: powershell ./copy_dlls_to.ps1 all && cd src-tauri && cargo build -p lol_rec --release && powershell cp .\target\release\lol_rec.exe .\lol_rec-x86_64-pc-windows-msvc.exe
build.beforeBuildCommand: powershell ./copy_dlls_to.ps1 release && cd src-tauri && cargo build -p lol_rec --release && powershell cp .\target\release\lol_rec.exe .\lol_rec-x86_64-pc-windows-msvc.exe
